com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.flatfile

Class DefaultFlatFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.AbstractConfigurable
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.ComponentHelper
        • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.flatfile.DefaultFlatFileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPeerApplicationReader, IPeerApplicationResultSet, IComponent, IHasAttributes, IConfigurable, IRegisterable

    public class DefaultFlatFileReader
extends ComponentHelper
implements IPeerApplicationReader, IPeerApplicationResultSet
    Default flat file implementation of the IPeerApplicationReader interface.

    This application uses the FifoFileQueue as the underlying file system interface.

    Author:
    Maria Ischuk modified to use BytesSegment as part of adapting FlatFileAdapter to us IFIXMessage/IMessageTransformer(StandardFixTransformer)

      • read

        public IPeerApplicationResultSet read()
                               throws PeerApplicationException
        Description copied from interface: IPeerApplicationReader
        Read an object from the peer application.

        This method must not return any objects previously marked as being sent or being in error via the IPeerApplicationResultSet.markAsSent() and IPeerApplicationResultSet.markAsError(java.lang.Object) methods respectively.

        Specified by:
        read in interface IPeerApplicationReader
        Returns:
        A result set containing zero or more objects.
        Throws:
        PeerApplicationException - On error.

      • markAsError

        public void markAsError(Object error)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException,
                        PeerApplicationException
        Description copied from interface: IPeerApplicationResultSet
        Mark the object at the current position as having an error.

        This method is used to signal to the peer application that the object was not sent, nor will it ever be sent, to FIX.

        Specified by:
        markAsError in interface IPeerApplicationResultSet
        Parameters:
        error - An error to send to the peer application.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - The error being sent to the peer application is invalid.
        PeerApplicationException - On error.
